Text: Thanks,I converted this to psp.iso and it works.
First one doesnt seem to have music. Rest works(im using psx not emulator)

they used to let us borrow the PSX 1 for 3 days at a fair price, i remembered this game and wished to play it as the years go by and YOU sir have made MY DAY ! i applaud you and THANKS for sharing ! a billion times thanks !
